statements: SELECT * FROM student_enrollment
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY course_name DESC
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01' AND enrollment_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, course_id, COUNT(*) AS total_enrollments FROM student_enrollment GROUP BY student_id, course_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%' ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year FROM students WHERE enrollment_year >= 2018;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students WHERE enrollment_year > 2018
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT student_name AS Name, enrollment_year AS Year FROM students WHERE student_id = 101
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY enrollment_year DESC
SELECT course_id, course_name, LENGTH(course_description) AS desc_length FROM courses
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM students;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollment ON students.student_id = enrollment.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollment ON students.student_id = enrollment.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollment ON students.student_id = enrollment.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status='Active';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT * FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructor_name, expertise_area FROM Instructors ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT Courses.course_name, Instructors.instructor_name FROM Courses INNER JOIN Instructors ON Courses.course_id = Instructors.instructor_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_year = 2021;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructor_name, specialization FROM instructors JOIN course_instructors ON instructors.instructor_id = course_instructors.instructor_id WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_year > 2018;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE credit_hours BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT students.first_name, courses.course_name FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT instructors.instructor_name, COUNT(course_instructors.instructor_id) AS total_courses FROM course_instructors INNER JOIN instructors ON course_instructors.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id GROUP BY course_instructors.instructor_id ORDER BY total_courses DESC;
